New Records: First walk-off grand slam in World Series history by Freddie Freeman
Key Match Events: Freddie Freeman's walk-off grand slam in the 10th inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers hope to get similar length from Game 2 starter Yoshinobu Yamamoto that they got from Jack Flaherty in Game 1
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Volpe expressed confidence in the team's ability to bounce back after the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the first World Series meeting between the Dodgers and Yankees since 1988
Others: The Dodgers won Game 1 with a score of 6-3
